channel.title: Some fixes, critical to my server, need help
channel.description: ok, first to clear something up, im using deltascape base 1. When i try using the spec of dragon claws on other players, i disconnect, why does this happen?(works fine on npcs however!) 2. How do i make a multi combat zone? (i know how the code goes, but could someone explain it to me? i dont understand how to make a certain area multi combat) 3. There is this one npc that i cant attack, how would i make it attackable? (it has the attack option, just doesnt attack when you click on it) 4. how can i make it so you dont loose anything anywere other than in the wild 5. when an aggressive npc trys to attack someone, they just walk through objects, how can i prevent this? (basically noclips through the object) 6. i followed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457701.msg3349622.html#msg3349622 it worked for the abyssal demon monster, but it does not work for otheer npcs (abyssal guardian, abyssal walker, zombies..) what is wrong? i went over the tutorial 5 times... how can i solve these?

item.title: Some fixes, critical to my server, need help
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

ok, first to clear something up, im using deltascape base

  1. When i try using the spec of dragon claws on other players, i disconnect, why does this happen?(works fine on npcs however!)
  2. How do i make a multi combat zone? (i know how the code goes, but could someone explain it to me? i dont understand how to make a certain area multi combat)
  3. There is this one npc that i cant attack, how would i make it attackable? (it has the attack option, just doesnt attack when you click on it)
  4. how can i make it so you dont loose anything anywere other than in the wild
  5. when an aggressive npc trys to attack someone, they just walk through objects, how can i prevent this? (basically noclips through the object)
  6. i followed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457701.msg3349622.html#msg3349622
    it worked for the abyssal demon monster, but it does not work for otheer npcs (abyssal guardian, abyssal walker, zombies…) what is wrong? i went over the tutorial 5 times…
    how can i solve these?

Read full topic
item.source: Some fixes, critical to my server, need help
